title.rendered: Wireless Earbuds,Bluetooth Headphones,Graphene Driver, Clear Sound, USB-C Quick Charge,40H Playtime,IPX7 Waterproof…

content.rendered:
Colour Name:Air-TWS

Crystal-Clear Calls: 4 microphones with the newest cVc noise discount know-how spotlight your voice whereas lowering background sounds.

Expertly Tuned Sound: Graphene drivers produce a wider soundstage with distinctive accuracy and readability.

BassUp Technology: Exclusive know-how conducts real-time evaluation and enhancement of your audio’s bass frequencies so as to add highly effective sonic punch.

aptX Technology: Your music is transferred on the highest potential high quality to protect the sound and offer you an distinctive listening expertise with CD-like audio high quality.

Up to 40 Hours of Playtime: 7 hours of playtime on a single cost, 40 hours with the charging case.

Waterproof Casing: IPX7-rated safety defends your earbuds towards liquids.

One-Step Pairing: true wi-fi earbuds mechanically join with the final paired system

Bluetooth 5.0: An ultra-stable connection for skip-free streaming.

Mono or Stereo: Switch between utilizing both earbud by itself, or each collectively.

Specifications

Audio Sensitivity: 92 dB SPL

Frequency: 20Hz-20kHz

FPC Antenna Return Loss: Typical: -14dB Limit :-12dB

Microphone: MEMS Omnidirectional Mic

What’s In The Box

Wireless Earbuds

Compact Charging Case

USB-C Cable

Make positive this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Incredible Sound Powered By Graphene Drivers*: Delivers music with a wider soundstage and distinctive accuracy and readability. BassUp know-how enhances bass by as much as 43% and aptX audio provides lossless transmission between your system and the wi-fi earbuds.
system and the wi-fi earbuds. 40-Hour Playtime* with Fast Charge: A single cost offers you a full 7 hours of listening, whereas the charging case extends that to 40 hours. When you’re in a rush and want energy quick, merely cost for 10 minutes and stand up to 1 hour of playtime.
Convenient Touch Control*: Effortlessly handle audio playback & calls with the multi-function contact button and mic on every earbud. The earbuds may even be used alone like a Bluetooth headset.
One-Step Connection*: Simply open the charging case and they’re going to mechanically connect with your cellphone (after being paired the primary time). Stable, environment friendly wi-fi reference to Bluetooth 5 and a specialised antenna for strong sign that resists interference.
IPX7 Waterproof*: wi-fi earbuds boast IPX7-rated safety that defends towards liquids in any climate circumstances.
